Variable.Name: ModifyLockDateExpiredLicenseError
Variable.Value: The license could not be created or updated. Please check with your system administrator for more information.vbcrlfThe Lock Date cannot be modified for expired licenses.

Variable.Name: ModifyLockDatePreferenceInvalidError
Variable.Value: The license could not be created or updated. Please check with your system administrator for more information.vbcrlfThe privilege "PREFNAME" specified in ADA_license_administration_privilege site preference is invalid.

Variable.Name: ModifySubgroupNotEnabledError
Variable.Value: The license could not be created or updated. Please check with your system administrator for more information.vbcrlfThe subgroup support is not enabled.

Variable.Name: AddingUserToLockedLicenseError@1
Variable.Value: The license could not be created or updated. Please check with your system administrator for more information.vbcrlfAdding users/groups to locked/expired licenses is not allowed.
